trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around June 28th 2013
Summary: saw a plane flashing in sky, then noticed ufo following it
divs: Sighting DetailsMy sister and I were letting the dogs out, when we both noticed a plane flying over head with it's flashing lights. Then all of Sudden,I was like"uh do you see that?" Then I said, oh it's a satellite. Just as I said that it gave off a bright white flash of light. Then we looked each other and I was like that's too fast to be a satellite. So then I came and got my phone and googled where the satellite was and it said not in this area tonight. We are in SE Portland oregon by mall 205. Then I tried looking on twitter with no luck, so I came here.the plane and the ufo flew off to the north and disappeared. I'm pretty sure a satellite would have taken at least 5 minutes to move the same length as this did in one minute or less.hopefully we're not the only ones to see it.
